hierarchy_changes.description: Establish base color, spacing, and typography scales. Added complete dark mode variants.
Created semantic aliases for Primitive tokens (e.g., color.text.primary, color.bg.surface).
Standardized Auto-Layout on all primitive elements. Decomposed overloaded layout groups into component slots. Introduced interaction states: focus, empty, loading.
Assemble patterns into functional page definitions without hardcoding text fields inside components.
